text: Hey guys, you won't believe what just happened to me!
speaker: Jake

text: I swear it's true! I saw a flying saucer!
speaker: Jake

text: I don't believe you, Jake. You always have some crazy story.
speaker: Rachel

text: This time it's for real, I swear!
speaker: Jake

text: I can't. It flew away too fast.
speaker: Jake
